verbose_text: Reduced ADAMTS13 activity may result in an accumulation of ultra-large VWF on endothelial surface and heightened platelet adhesion and aggregation, promoting thromboembolism and metastasis.
evidence: ADAMTS13 activity may result in an accumulation of ultra-large VWF on endothelial surface and heightened platelet adhesion and aggregation, promoting thromboembolism and metastasis
